channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- wildfly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- wildfly

item.title: CVE-2020-14297|2024-10-15T17:14:53.962Z -- red%20hat -- wildfly
item.description: A flaw was discovered in Wildfly's EJB Client as shipped with Red Hat JBoss EAP 7, where some specific EJB transaction objects may get accumulated over the time and can cause services to slow down and eventaully unavailable. An attacker can take advantage and cause denial of service attack and make services unavailable.
